data.field: [http://github.com/mirrors/perl/tree/perl-1-maint|traditionally] [http://perl5.git.perl.org/APC/perl-5.8.x-dor/|patched] [http://perl.apache.org/embperl/|embedded] [http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/linux/library/l-p101/|cultured] [id://505817|dead] [http://www.scriptarchive.com/|archaic] [mod://Modern::Perl|modern] [http://www.wall.org/~larry/pm.html|postmodern] [mod://MooseX::Declare|with sugar] [http://search.cpan.org/search?query=plugin&mode=dist|accessorized] [mod://App::perlbrew|freshly brewed] [http://perl6.org/|in version 6] with no artificial additives
